item.title: Mobile Design Feedback
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Been working with a new client lately. Have a mockup of the mobile version of the site almost done. Feedback appreciated! 


/*
*
*	Author: Cory Allen
*	Responsive properties built 
*	off Apple product screensizes...
*/

body {

	background: #fff;
	font-family: 'Asap', sans-serif;
	color: #655;
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 1em;
}

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5 {

	color: #333;
	font-weight: 700;
}

/**************************
	iPhone
***************************/

@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {

	header {
	
		width: auto;
		height: auto;
		margin: 0 auto;
		text-align: center;
	}

	nav {
	
		min-width: 100%;
		height: 45px;
		border-top: 1px solid #ddd;
		border-bottom: 4px solid #ddd;
		background: #f9f9f9;
		line-height: 45px;
		margin: 15px auto;
	}
	
	nav ul {
	
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0;
		list-style: none;
	}
	
	nav ul li {
	
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0;
		display: inline;
	}
	
	nav ul li a {
	
		font-weight: 700;
		color: #333;
		text-decoration: none;
		padding: 9px 12px;
	}
	
	nav ul li a:hover {
	
		color: #577da4;
	}
	
	#welcome {
	
		width: auto;
		height: auto;
		padding: 20px;
		text-align: center;
	}
	
	h1 {
	
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0;
	}
	
	#short_about {
	
		width: auto;
		height: auto;
		background: #577da4;
		color: #fff;
		text-align: center;
		padding: 20px;
	}
	
	#short_about h2 {
	
		color: #fff;
	}
	
	#box_section {
	
		width: auto;
		height: auto;
		padding: 20px;
	}
	
	#boxes {
	
		list-style: none;
		margin: 20px;
		padding: 0;
	}
	
	#boxes li {
	
		margin: 0 0 20px 0;
		padding: 0;
	}
	
	.box {
	
		border: 1px solid #ddd;
		border-bottom: 3px solid #ddd;
		border-radius: 3px;
		padding: 10px;
	}
	
	.box img {
	
		width: 100%;
	}
	
	a.box_button {
	
		border: 2px solid #577da4;
		border-radius: 3px;
		text-decoration: none;
		color: #577da4;
		font-weight: 700;
		padding: 5px 9px;
		margin: 10px 0 10px 0;
		display: inline-block;
	}
}
<?php include('includes/header.php'); ?>
	<section id="welcome">
		<h1>GiniCoe - Next Level Security</h1>
		<p>This is a tagline. Put some useful information here for your audience!</p>
	</section>
	<section id="short_about">

	</section>
	<section id="box_information">
		<ul id="boxes">
			<li>
				<div class="box">
					<img src="resources/1_con.jpg" alt="Consumers" />
